events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because the product is not what I paid for.
The customer issue has been categorized under refund due to their request to get money back for an incorrect item received.
Support agent John Doe has been assigned to handle the refund case for the customer's incorrect order.
Hello! I'm John from support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. Iâ€™m here to help you resolve this quickly.
Could you please provide your order number and a photo of the item you received? This will help us process your refund efficiently.
Sure, my order number is 9876543210. I've attached a photo showing the incorrect product that was sent instead of the one I ordered.
Thank you for the info. We will initiate a full refund to your original payment method within 3-5 business days and provide you with a prepaid return label.
Thanks for the prompt response! The refund solution sounds good. I appreciate you sending a return label as well.
Your refund has been processed and the return label emailed to you. Please let us know if you need any more assistance.
Just checking in to confirm that you received the refund and returned the wrong item without any issues.
We are closing this case now, assuming the refund was successful and no further action is needed. Thank you for contacting support.
